mapper.select: select id,text,value,orderNo,typeCode from tbl_dic_value where typeCode=#{typeCode}
select id, value, text, orderNo, typeCode from tbl_dic_value order by typeCode,orderNo;
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_dic_value(id, value, text, orderNo, typeCode) values (#{id},#{value},#{text},#{orderNo},#{typeCode})
